title: Incorrect Audio Language Track
description: A user reports that a movie labeled as having a Spanish audio track is only playing in English.

tasks.description: Identify the movie asset and check its available audio tracks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the asset metadata lists a Spanish audio track, but the file itself does not contain one.

tasks.description: Temporarily remove the 'Spanish audio' label from the movie's description to avoid further user confusion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the public-facing metadata.

tasks.description: Request the correct file with the Spanish audio track from the content provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a re-delivery request to the provider.
